sections.text:
I am writing to confirm the outcome of your probation period which commenced on [START_DATE] and was due to end on [PROBATION_END_DATE].

Performance Summary:
[PERFORMANCE_SUMMARY]

I am pleased to confirm that you have successfully completed your probationary period. With effect from [CONFIRMATION_DATE], you are confirmed as a permanent employee and your full contractual benefits and notice period will apply.

[OPTIONAL: Your next performance review is scheduled for [NEXT_REVIEW_DATE].]

Congratulations on your successful probation. We look forward to your continued contribution to the team.

I am writing regarding your probation period which commenced on [START_DATE] and was due to end on [PROBATION_END_DATE].

Performance Summary:
[PERFORMANCE_SUMMARY]

Areas Requiring Improvement:
[IMPROVEMENT_AREAS]

Following our review meeting on [REVIEW_MEETING_DATE], we have decided to extend your probationary period by [EXTENSION_PERIOD] until [NEW_END_DATE].

During this extension period, we expect you to:
[OBJECTIVE_1]
[OBJECTIVE_2]
[OBJECTIVE_3]

You will receive support from [SUPPORT_PERSON] and we will conduct a further review on [FURTHER_REVIEW_DATE].

The terms of your probationary period, including the reduced notice period of [NOTICE_PERIOD], will continue during the extension.
sections.compliance_notes: Use for probation extension; must set clear objectives and support plan

sections.text:
I am writing to inform you of the outcome of your probation period which commenced on [START_DATE].

Following our review meeting on [REVIEW_MEETING_DATE], I regret to inform you that your employment will terminate on [TERMINATION_DATE] as you have not met the required standards during your probationary period.

Reasons for Decision:
[TERMINATION_REASONS]

Your notice period is [NOTICE_PERIOD] as set out in your contract. You will receive payment for all work performed up to [TERMINATION_DATE], including any accrued but untaken holiday.

Please return all Company property by [TERMINATION_DATE], including:
- [PROPERTY_ITEM_1]
- [PROPERTY_ITEM_2]
- [PROPERTY_ITEM_3]

Your final payment will be processed on [FINAL_PAYMENT_DATE].

If you wish to appeal this decision, please submit your appeal in writing to [APPEAL_CONTACT] within [APPEAL_DAYS] days of receiving this letter.
sections.compliance_notes: Use for unsuccessful probation; must follow fair procedure and allow appeal. Note: employees with less than 2 years' service cannot claim ordinary unfair dismissal (except for automatically unfair reasons)

sections.text:
If you have any questions, please contact [CONTACT_PERSON].

Yours sincerely,

[SIGNATORY_NAME]
[SIGNATORY_TITLE]

compliance_checklist: Extension objectives specific and measurable (if applicable)
Notice period complies with contract and statute
